__e: Why don't you ask your crystal ball where the fuck Billy is, who's been missing for two days?
Unless you have some crystal ball you've been hiding somewhere I don't know about.
Some powerful crystal ball you've got there, able to see right into people's hearts.
The future? I mean, i've never heard of the 4400, and i can promise you that nobody ever came back in a ball of light.
You remember best through the things you both shared as children. Like myself or the pretty mademoiselle - within the glass bubble.
The things you talk about... the ball of light, the 4400... you know about the 4400?
Is that what you're calling it?
I've been running his name on every database in the known webosphere, and I just found something new.
I've come for the Dragon Ball on top of that kid's head.
We know each other too well for that.
Isn't it possible that you went inside the Sphere and you just don't remember?
Hey. Stop talkin' to yourself, dumb guy. Take your ball and get outta here.
Then... are you saying that you need to be by my side... until you get back that grateful bead... inside of me that's healing me?
But he's looking at the ball bearing I found, see what it's made of,help us, give us an idea of what it is.
I swear to God, that man was not alive when I examined him, which leads me to conclude that this is more your department than mine.
